reasoning: Tonic-clonic seizures (grand mal) are the most common seizure type in epilepsy. Estimating ~40-50% of epilepsy incidence (50-70 per 100k) = ~25 per 100k. Moderate confidence due to classification complexity.
source: Banerjee PN et al. (2009). The descriptive epidemiology of epilepsy-a review. Epilepsy Res. 85(1):31-45
